value.title: StarCraft 2: DOUBLE GOLD RUSH - New Base Race Map?! (Royal Blood)
value.excerpt: In this video I cast several games of StarCraft 2 on a new map called Royal Blood. This map placed 4th overall at the TLMC 17. Despite a short rush distance, this map provides a lot of safety early on by restricting movement of armies and allowing players to expand away from the main attack path. Bases

value.title: StarCraft 2: GAME OF THE YEAR! (So Far)
value.excerpt: Goblin versus Krystianer in an epic game of professional StarCraft 2. It's a bit early to call it the best game of SC2 of this year already, but it surely is the best so far. In this Protoss versus Protoss neither player ever manages to secure a solid economy so an intense micro battle is the only option.
